# Nelexa\GPlay\Exception\GooglePlayException::getResponse
`Nelexa\GPlay\Exception\GooglePlayException::getResponse` â€” Returns an HTTP response if present.

## Description
```php

```

## Parameters
This function has no parameters.

## Return Values
